ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of IVAN MARK LERNER of Côte St-Luc, Quebec, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective January 15, 2007.
